user_instruction: 'Tell John to reply to me (emily@innovatenow.com) with his thoughts on potential collaboration, and remind him he can check his Gmail and Notion for information.'

formatted_items.content:
Subject: Follow-up on Potential Collaboration Opportunities

Hi John,

I hope you’re doing well. When you have a moment, could you please share your thoughts on how TechSolutions Inc. and InnovateNow might collaborate? Emily (emily@innovatenow.com) is looking forward to your insights, so feel free to reply directly to her.

If helpful, you can review any related details in your Gmail and Notion before responding.

Thank you, and I appreciate your time!

Best regards,

[Your Name]
